extendedInfo.description: CookWizMe is the best Android App for people who LOVE to cook. With CookWizMe cooking becomes easy, fun, and social!DISCOVER AMAZING NEW PHOTO RECIPES EVERY DAY!All recipes on CookWizMe have step-by-step photo instructions that leave you no chance to fail. Whenever you need a cooking inspiration, browse the recipe feed and hit the kitchen!ADD AND SHARE YOUR OWN RECIPES EASILYTake pictures with your smartphone while you cook, list ingredients, add some short instructions and voilÃ  - your recipe is ready to be shared with others.BECOME COOKWIZME CELEBRITY!The more people like your recipe, the more chances youâll appear on the âPopularâ recipe tab! Keep getting likes and very soon youâll become a real CookWizMe celebrity!GO SHOPPINGCreate a shopping list with the ingredients you need and take it with you or send it to your other half! Youâll save time wandering the aisles.NEVER MISS A RECIPE FROM YOUR FAVORITE CHEFSFollow the chefs you like and see whatâs cookinâ in their kitchen!

reviews.title: Awsome!
reviews.comment: I love it! Best app ever :-)
reviews.author: Lisa Taylor

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Love this app to help steps by steps! Food looks so good!
reviews.author: Richelle Beebe

reviews.title: good app
reviews.comment: An easy-to-understand and easy-to-use application with a nice design. I hope to use it quite often.
reviews.author: Andrey Shapovalov

reviews.title: Seemed good
reviews.comment: It seemed good, I went through and liked some recipes, went to view my liked and was confronted with a fb/twitter login screen. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: Marcus Noble

reviews.title: Excellent recipe app
reviews.comment: First of all this is an awesome app from UI point of view. Second, within first 5 minutes with the app I found about 5 recipes that I want to try. Step by step instructions are very easy and helpful and ingredients list is very helpful feature. Looking forward to updates and more users.
reviews.author: Aleksandr Kravets

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: not a big fan of apps that tells me how to do stuff (work out, eat, sleep), but this one is truly \"A MUST HAVE\"! Thank you guys for a very handy addition!
reviews.author: Stan Plyako
